title: Fonts used on label of this Chilean wine?
content:
Can anyone help me id all three typefaces used on attached wine label?  
Two scripts and one san serif fonts I am looking for.  
Thanks in advance!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [wine\_label.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081023163015/http:/typophile.com/files/wine_label.jpg) | 78.03 KB |

 [‹ Need and ID on this Logo!](http://web.archive.org/web/20081023163015/http:/typophile.com/node/50516 "Go to previous forum topic") [Glass Font ID ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081023163015/http:/typophile.com/node/50490 "Go to next forum topic")
author: sangwooksohn

comments.content: Sans Serif looks like Scala Sans Caps.
The script is hand lettered. Your closest match is probably [Zapfino](http://web.archive.org/web/20081023163015/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/linotype/zapfino_extra_pro_ot_virtual/).
